mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DT, READ_COUNT ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT n.NOTICE_ID, n.USER_ID, u.USER_NAME, u.PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, n.TITLE, n.CONTENT, n.REG_DT, n.READ_COUNT FROM NOTICE n, USER u WHERE n.NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId} AND n.USER_ID = u.USER_ID

mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
